channel.title: CVE Feed for Facebook -- Redex
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Facebook -- Redex

item.title: CVE-2022-36938|2024-08-03T10:21:31.918Z -- facebook -- redex
item.description: DexLoader function get_stringidx_fromdex() in Redex prior to commit 3b44c64 can load an out of bound address when loading the string index table, potentially allowing remote code execution during processing of a 3rd party Android APK file.
